name: big-malasada
effect: Cures major status ailments and confusion.
short_effect: Cures major status ailments and confusion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Alola region’s local specialty—fried bread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Alola region’s local specialty—fried bread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Alola region’s local specialty—fried bread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
